name: ANOIX
description:
These are the voyages of the starship Anoix. Its 84-level mission to explore strange worlds, protect the ball from going outside and destroy all the bricks.Players about ANOIX:
ifanzine: "An absolutely intriguing spin on the Breakout/Arkanoid style."
napior: "Super idea, I haven't seen such solution in the Arkanoid type game."
LoboJimbo: "3D Arkanoid. Frustratingly addictive and challenging."Features:
  • 84 Challenging Levels
  • 5 Worlds
  • 7 Bonuses
  • Realistic Physics
  • Atmospheric Soundtrack and Graphics
  • Unique Gameplay

Ready for a challenge?
